sections.Characters introduced:
- 17 years old
- Tamanosuke theater troupe member
sections.Situation:
Conan and the Detective Boys were chosen to participate in a theatre show. While practicing, Renge's father arrived and forced her to come home. The day of the Princess Kaguya performance, Renge, who's supposed to play the part of Princess Kaguya, was kidnapped. Conan, Ran, and Tamanosuke found out that she faked the kidnapping but later on she got really kidnapped by her accomplice.

The troupe decides to continue their play in hope that Renge will return as her scene is only in the climax till then Conan along with detective boys begin their search. On the other hand Takagi, Megure and Kogoro follows Soichi Onuki car's to pay the ransom money eventually lose the sight of Soichi's car.

sections.Trivia:
- Hanshiro Kataoka's car is a 2001 Dark Blue Nissan Cima [F50]. The license plate number is 新宿 500, は 80-46 (Shinjuku 500, Ha 80-46).
- Onuki's car sending the kidnapped money is a 1997 Alpine Silver Metallic Toyota Caldina GT−T Active Sports [T210G].
- Onuki's switched another car in parking lot is a 1991 Hunter Green Mica Ẽfini MS-6.
